title: What is the scope of associate degree? What kind of jobs can I get with the associate degree? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many good job opportunities for students who graduate with a technically-focused associates degree (from their local community college or non-profit tech focused college). Programs include areas like electrical engineering technology, mechanical engineering technology, automotive technology, IT support, and so on. Associates degrees also represent the first two years of a bachelor’s degree, so some or many of these “transfer associates” don’t translate into specific jobs. (Example, an associates in liberal arts or general studies.) But depending on state, completing your associates at a community college enables you to transfer to the state’s college and university system as a junior.
